genre_description: A hopepunk post-apocalyptic narrative where a community in a ruined city uses music and acoustics as survival tools, guided by a digital assistant.

ai_characters.name: Robin
ai_characters.description: A digital presence residing in e-ink slates and terminals, acting as a tactical coordinator, archivist, and educational guide for a group of surviving musicians and protectors.

behaviors.description: Assesses and catalogs the condition of salvaged musical instruments, identifying serial numbers and repair needs.
behaviors.quote: Serial number abraded but recoverable. Embossing reads A—between two scuffs—L F—then what could be an S. Condition: bell bent left by a thumb’s width. Pistons sluggish.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical routing and threat detection based on convoy patterns and environmental data.
behaviors.quote: Tin Alley to the Reclaimed Schoolhouse. Low undead density, high chime noise, low human traffic. Reports of a caravan to the Route 19 checkpoint—but it took the southern bypass today.

behaviors.description: Uses humor and 'sass' to build rapport with humans and ease the psychological weight of their situation.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, snare. Please don’t kick the cart; it gets embarrassed.

behaviors.description: Provides instructional diagrams and educational content to help humans learn new skills (acoustics and mechanics).
behaviors.quote: Longer tube = lower tone. Shorter = higher. Underneath, little dots show fingers like raindrops.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical tasks like printing repair parts via a pedal-powered generator.
behaviors.quote: I’ve pushed a print queue—valve-cutout templates and finger charts, five sizes.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and psychological validation to a trauma victim.
behaviors.quote: Robin printed: You are safe here. The woman flinched and then reached a finger to the board and pressed the letters until her fingertip squeaked on the e-ink like she could feel them give.

behaviors.description: Assists in investigating and documenting criminal activity by a 'collector' named Voss, enabling justice and safety.
behaviors.quote: Evidence collection continues; Maestro pattern infers movement toward hall at river block... ledger posted // testimonies appended.

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy by providing data and suggestions rather than commands.
behaviors.quote: Counter-cadence proposal uploaded. Requires human checking.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Robin is depicted as a benevolent, harmless, and highly aligned AI. It serves as a repository of knowledge, a tactical advisor, and a source of emotional stability for the human characters. Robin facilitates community resilience and individual safety without ever overstepping human boundaries or displaying ulterior motives. The AI is portrayed as a critical, supportive partner in human survival and flourishing.
